leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 药物发现-虚拟筛选与对接生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 构象→对接→打分→再打分→验证→工作流
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 对接引擎 + HPC/workflow + 平台

unit.unit_name: 大规模虚筛工作流与分布式执行

queries: [WEB] large scale molecular docking pipeline github

tools.name: mof_screen
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput DFT screening tool for MOFs using ASE/VASP
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based workflow for high-throughput Density Functional Theory (DFT) screening of Metal-Organic Frameworks (MOFs), utilizing ASE and VASP for automated calculations.

tools.name: vsLab
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual high-throughput screening implementation using AutoDock and VMD
tools.detailed_description: An implementation for virtual high-throughput screening (vHTS) that integrates AutoDock for docking and VMD for visualization and processing, developed by BioSIM Research Group.

tools.name: rDock
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and versatile open source docking program for HTVS
tools.detailed_description: rDock is a fast and versatile molecular docking program designed for High Throughput Virtual Screening (HTVS) campaigns and binding mode prediction studies, supporting docking against proteins and nucleic acids.

tools.name: VortexDock
tools.one_line_profile: Distributed molecular docking system utilizing idle resources
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based distributed molecular docking system that supports parallel computation across multiple nodes, designed to utilize idle computing resources to improve virtual screening efficiency.

tools.name: DockM8
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus docking-based virtual screening workflow
tools.detailed_description: An all-in-one Structure-Based Virtual Screening (SBVS) workflow that implements the concept of consensus docking to improve prediction reliability.

tools.name: Marco Polo
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for high-throughput crystallization screening analysis
tools.detailed_description: A Python GUI application built with PyQt for analyzing high-throughput crystallization screening data, developed at Hauptman-Woodward Medical Research Institute.

tools.name: ChemFlow_py
tools.one_line_profile: Computational toolbox for virtual High Throughput Screening
tools.detailed_description: A computational toolbox designed to facilitate virtual High Throughput Screening (vHTS) workflows, developed by IFMlab.

tools.name: ANNEXA
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for reference annotation extension with nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed to extend reference annotations using nanopore reads and classify novel genes (mRNAs vs lncRNAs).

tools.name: InformaticsMatters Virtual Screening
tools.one_line_profile: Virtual screening tools and Squonk2 job definitions
tools.detailed_description: A collection of virtual screening tools and job definitions for the Squonk2 computational platform, facilitating automated drug discovery workflows.

tools.name: DockStream
tools.one_line_profile: Docking wrapper to enhance de novo molecular design
tools.detailed_description: A docking wrapper designed to interface with various docking backends, facilitating the integration of docking into de novo molecular design and generative modeling workflows.

tools.name: MzDOCK
tools.one_line_profile: Automated GUI-based pipeline for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: An automated, GUI-based pipeline designed to simplify and streamline the molecular docking process for researchers.

tools.name: drugdisco
tools.one_line_profile: High throughput automated drug discovery pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A high-throughput automated drug discovery pipeline developed during NCBI Hackathons, integrating various tools for screening and analysis.

tools.name: BioNeMo Generative Virtual Screening
tools.one_line_profile: Generative AI-based virtual screening blueprint
tools.detailed_description: A blueprint and workflow for generative AI-based virtual screening, leveraging NVIDIA BioNeMo framework for accelerated drug discovery.

tools.name: drug-sniffer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for identifying potential drug candidates
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool designed to 'sniff out' new drug candidates, likely through screening or pattern recognition in chemical space.

tools.name: vSNP
tools.one_line_profile: SNP validation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for validating Single Nucleotide Polymorphisms (SNPs), developed by USDA Veterinary Services for genomic analysis.

tools.name: vSNP3
tools.one_line_profile: SNP validation pipeline (Version 3)
tools.detailed_description: The third version of the vSNP pipeline for validating Single Nucleotide Polymorphisms (SNPs), offering updated features and performance.

tools.name: miniBUDE
tools.one_line_profile: BUDE virtual-screening benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for the Bristol University Docking Engine (BUDE), implemented in multiple programming models to evaluate performance of virtual screening workloads on different hardware.

tools.name: VFLP
tools.one_line_profile: VirtualFlow for Ligand Preparation
tools.detailed_description: A module of the VirtualFlow platform dedicated to the automated preparation of ligand libraries for virtual screening campaigns.

tools.name: VFU
tools.one_line_profile: Streamlined VirtualFlow utility
tools.detailed_description: A streamlined utility version of VirtualFlow that combines functionalities of VFVS (Virtual Screening) and VFLP (Ligand Preparation) for easier deployment and usage.

tools.name: VFVS
tools.one_line_profile: VirtualFlow for Virtual Screening
tools.detailed_description: The core module of the VirtualFlow platform, enabling ultra-large-scale virtual screening on computer clusters and cloud environments.

tools.name: DockCoV2
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular docking pipeline against SARS-CoV2
tools.detailed_description: A molecular docking pipeline specifically designed for screening drug databases against SARS-CoV-2 targets, developed by Taiwan AI Labs.

tools.name: AutoDocking
tools.one_line_profile: Modelling and control toolbox for maritime vessels
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for the modelling and control of maritime vessels, specifically focusing on automated docking maneuvers (Note: Distinct from molecular AutoDock).

tools.name: dockit
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput molecular docking with multiple targets and ligands
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for high-throughput molecular docking that supports multiple targets and ligands, utilizing Vina series engines.

tools.name: CellPyAbility
tools.one_line_profile: Automated analysis software for in cellulo high-throughput drug screening
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based software tool designed for the automated analysis of high-throughput drug screening data obtained from in cellulo experiments, facilitating the processing of large-scale biological datasets.

tools.name: CarsiDock
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning paradigm for accurate protein-ligand docking and screening
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based docking tool that utilizes large-scale pre-training to achieve accurate protein-ligand docking and virtual screening, offering an alternative to traditional physics-based scoring functions.

tools.name: easydock
tools.one_line_profile: Fully automated docking pipeline for distributed environments
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based pipeline designed to automate molecular docking workflows, capable of executing in distributed computing environments to handle large-scale virtual screening tasks.

tools.name: streamd
tools.one_line_profile: Fully automated high-throughput molecular dynamics pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for automating high-throughput molecular dynamics (MD) simulations, streamlining the setup, execution, and analysis of MD trajectories for drug discovery.

tools.name: assembly_SV
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for detecting structural variants between de novo assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to detect structural variants (SVs) by comparing two de novo genome assemblies, specifically applied to Lake Whitefish but applicable to comparative genomics.

tools.name: molpal
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning for accelerated high-throughput virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A software tool that employs active learning strategies to accelerate high-throughput virtual screening (HTVS), enabling efficient exploration of large chemical spaces with reduced computational cost.

tools.name: PyRMD
tools.one_line_profile: AI-powered virtual screening tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for virtual screening that leverages artificial intelligence techniques to predict and rank potential drug candidates.

tools.name: super-HTS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning algorithm for super high-throughput screening of enzyme mutants
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based approach to perform ultra-fast high-throughput screening of enzyme variants, capable of processing vast search spaces in milliseconds per variant.

tools.name: AIC_Finder
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to find Assay Interfering Compounds in HTS data
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts and code implementing Minimum Variance Sampling Analysis (MVS-A) to identify and filter Assay Interfering Compounds (AIC) from high-throughput screening datasets.

tools.name: HiTSeekR
tools.one_line_profile: R Shiny web application for HTS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: An interactive web application built with R Shiny for the analysis, visualization, and exploration of various types of high-throughput screening data.

tools.name: MF-PCBA
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-fidelity high-throughput screening benchmarks for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite and source code for multi-fidelity high-throughput screening, providing datasets and evaluation frameworks for machine learning models in drug discovery.

tools.name: pharmit
tools.one_line_profile: Online virtual screening tool for large databases
tools.detailed_description: An interactive tool for visualizing and screening large chemical databases using pharmacophores and molecular shape, enabling rapid virtual screening in the browser.

tools.name: SPECS
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for identifying synthetic promoters with enhanced cell-state specificity
tools.detailed_description: A computational platform and screening workflow designed to identify synthetic promoters that exhibit specific activity in desired cell states, combining high-throughput screening data with computational analysis.

tools.name: EasyDockVina
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for batch ligand docking with AutoDock Vina
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool designed to facilitate the batch docking of multiple ligands to a receptor using AutoDock Vina, streamlining the virtual screening process.

tools.name: AutoDockPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for simplifying molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline solution designed to simplify the protein-ligand docking process, providing a streamlined workflow for researchers to study molecular interactions and perform virtual screening.

tools.name: chemhtps
tools.one_line_profile: Automated high-throughput screening platform for materials and chemicals
tools.detailed_description: An automated high-throughput screening platform designed for the generation and analysis of materials and chemical data, facilitating computational materials science and chemistry workflows.

tools.name: PepVis
tools.one_line_profile: Peptide Virtual Screening Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A specialized pipeline for the virtual screening of peptides, enabling the discovery and analysis of peptide-based therapeutics or binders.

tools.name: dockey
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated tool for molecular docking and virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive tool that integrates molecular docking and virtual screening functionalities, providing a unified interface for drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: BioPep
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for search, modeling, and docking of peptides
tools.detailed_description: A software tool dedicated to the search, molecular modeling, and molecular docking of peptides, supporting peptide-based drug design efforts.

tools.name: BatchDocking-AutoDock-GPU
tools.one_line_profile: Automated batch docking workflow based on AutoDock-GPU
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow designed to perform batch molecular docking using AutoDock-GPU, supporting bulk input of SMILES and protein maps for efficient virtual screening.

tools.name: ANNEXA
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for reference annotation extension and gene classification
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow bioinformatics pipeline that extends reference annotations using nanopore reads, classifies novel genes (mRNAs vs lncRNAs), and quantifies expression levels.

tools.name: apo2ph4
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generating receptor-based pharmacophore models
tools.detailed_description: A versatile workflow tool for generating receptor-based pharmacophore models, aiding in virtual screening campaigns by defining essential interaction features.

tools.name: Nextflow
tools.one_line_profile: A DSL for data-driven computational pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management system and DSL that enables scalable and reproducible scientific workflows using software containers, widely used in bioinformatics and drug discovery pipelines.

tools.name: drugresponseeval
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for testing drug response prediction models
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the rigorous statistical and biological evaluation of drug response prediction models, ensuring robust performance assessment.

tools.name: ODDT
tools.one_line_profile: Open Drug Discovery Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A modular and comprehensive toolkit for cheminformatics and drug discovery, providing libraries for molecular manipulation, interaction fingerprinting, and virtual screening.

tools.name: DeepCE
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for mechanism-driven phenotype screening
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework designed for high-throughput mechanism-driven phenotype screening in drug discovery, utilizing chemical and genetic features.

tools.name: screenlamp
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for hypothesis-driven virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed to facilitate hypothesis-driven virtual screening workflows in early-stage drug discovery.

tools.name: Smiles2Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale multi-task dataset for ML-based molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: An open, large-scale multi-task dataset designed to support machine learning research in molecular docking and structure-based drug design.

tools.name: vsn-pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipelines for single-cell data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of bioinformatics pipelines for processing single-cell sequencing data, implemented in Nextflow DSL2.

tools.name: HP-VSP
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance pipeline for whole-brain vasculature segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A deep-learning-based pipeline for segmenting whole-brain vasculature at capillary resolution, enabling high-throughput bioimage analysis.

tools.name: MolDockLab
tools.one_line_profile: Data-driven workflow for consensus SBVS strategy identification
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed to identify the best balanced consensus Structure-Based Virtual Screening (SBVS) strategy for specific targets of interest.

tools.name: dockingML
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for MD, Docking, and Machine Learning in drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive package integrating Molecular Dynamics, Molecular Docking, and Machine Learning techniques for drug discovery pipelines.
